name: LUMINES Supernova
description:
Indulge in the fusion of puzzle, lights and music! The latest installment to the blockbuster franchise from Tetsuya Mizuguchi and Q Entertainment comes packed with brand new skins and new modes, exclusive to the PLAYSTATION®3 computer entertainment system.

LUMINES™ Supernova combines puzzles, block-dropping beats and video entertainment to create a pulse-pounding experience that will keep you playing day after day.

Features include:
- All-new Dig Down Mode- dig down through the blocks and clear as many stages as possible!
- Sequencer Mode- create your own game soundtrack!
- Challenge Mode- four different modes, with 20 new skins!
- Skin Edit Mode- rearrange the skin order and play using your favorite skins!
- 2P Battle Mode- battle your friends in a head-to-head battle!
- Time Attack Mode- compete against the clock!
- Puzzle Mode- create various shapes!
- Mission Mode- clear various mission objectives!
